thread.title: Monday Night Football: How to watch Giants at Eagles
thread.title_full: Monday Night Football: How to watch Giants at Eagles

title: Monday Night Football: How to watch Giants at Eagles
text:
Monday Night Football: How to watch Giants at Eagles Monday Night Football: How to watch Giants at Eagles 
Oct 11, 2015; East Rutherford, NJ, USA; New York Giants quarterback Eli Manning (10) throws the ball against the San Francisco 49ers in the first half at MetLife Stadium. (Robert Deutsch/USA Today Sports) Like Sports News on Facebook: reviewjournal.com 
The New York Giants (3-2) visit the Philadelphia Eagles (2-3) at Lincoln Financial Field in Philadelphia tonight for Monday Night Football. Here's everything you need to know to catch the game. 
The Giants enter the game on a three-game winning streak, while the Eagles enter the game off a 39-17 win over the New Orleans Saints last Sunday. 
Time: 5:30 p.m. PDT 
TV: ESPN (DirecTV 209, Cox 31, Dish 143, CenturyLink 28) 
Online: NFL Game Pass (listen live) 
If you can't catch the game at home on TV or online, you can always head down to your favorite NFL bar or game night hangout in the valley.
